data_table.description: Physical Activity Questionnaire, Offspring Cohort Exam 6

variable.name: PA_1
variable.description: HOW MANY TIMES PER WEEK DO YOU ENGAGE IN INTENSE PHYSICAL ACTIVITY? (ENOUGH TO WORK UP A SWEAT)

variable.name: PA_2
variable.description: HOW WOUD YOU COMPARE LAST WEEK'S ACTIVITY TO YOUR USUAL ACTIVITY DURING THE YEAR?

variable.name: PA_3
variable.description: HOW WOULD YOU COMPARE YOUR ACTIVITY LEVEL TO OTHERS YOUR AGE?

variable.name: PA_9A
variable.description: HOW MANY FLIGHTS OF STAIRS DO YOU CLIMB EACH DAY (LET 1 FLIGHT = 10 STEPS)

variable.name: PA_9B
variable.description: HOW MANY CITY BLOCKS (OR THEIR EQUIVALENT) DO YOU WALK EACH DAY (LET 12 BLOCKS = 1 MILE)

variable.name: FP_TIME
variable.description: FULL/PART TIME CODE (IF WORKING OUTSIDE THE HOME LESS THAN 20 HOURS/WEEK PUT RETIRED OR HOMEMAKER. SPECIFY PART-TIME IF ONLY WORK PART-TIME)

variable.name: OCCUP
variable.description: OCCUPATION CODE (CODE YOUR OCCUPATION ACCORDING TO ATTACHED SHEET)
variable.value: SKILLED LABOR (E.G. PLUMBER, CARPENTER, PAINTER, HAIRDRESSER)
CLERGY (MINISTER, PRIEST, RABBI) SPORTS PRO/COACH/EXERCISE INSTRUCTOR OTHER
GENERAL LABOR (E.G. CUSTODIAN, DELIVERY, MAILMAN, TRUCKDRIVER)
NURSE/MEDICAL PERSONNEL LABORATORY TECHNICIAN PHYSICAL/OCCUPATIONAL/SPEECH THERAPIST
